data.oai_dc:dc: PISCO: Physical Oceanography: moored temperature data: Point Sur, California, USA (PTS001)

This metadata record describes moored seawater temperature data collected at Point Sur, California, USA, by PISCO. Measurements were collected using StowAway XTI Temperature Loggers (Onset Computer Corp. XTI32-05+37) beginning 2001-02-01. The instrument depth was 019 meters, in an overall water depth of 021 meters (both relative to Mean Sea Level, MSL). The sampling interval was 2.0 minutes.
